short_summary: Cartage Services for the Winnipeg Tax Centre
full_summary:
**Cartage Services for the Winnipeg Tax Centre**

[Government Tender Announcement]

**Reference:** CB-991-24231263
**Solicitation Number:** 1000460137

**Procurement Overview**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of cartage services for the Winnipeg Tax Centre. This contract will involve the provision of scheduled and unscheduled mail pick-up and delivery services.

**Key Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: January 10, 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**Contract Details**

The contract period will be for a base term of one year, with options to extend for an additional four years. The contractor will be required to provide cartage services for the Winnipeg Tax Centre, including unscheduled pick-up and delivery services.

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Pricing: The lowest priced responsive proposal will be evaluated as the most responsive.
* Mandatory Requirements: Proposals must meet all mandatory requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

**Security Requirements**

* This procurement is subject to security requirements, which are outlined in the solicitation document.

**Trade Agreements**

* This procurement is subject to the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* However, this procurement is not subject to the following trade agreements:

Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement
Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Conditional Set-Aside**

This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

**Queries**

Queries must be directed to the contracting authority via email at [Henrik.Schwerdtfeger@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:Henrik.Schwerdtfeger@cra-arc.gc.ca).

**Proposal Submission**

Proposals must be submitted using the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation.

Contact Information:
Henrik Schwerdtfeger
[Henrik.Schwerdtfeger@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:Henrik.Schwerdtfeger@cra-arc.gc.ca)
